005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.resource;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IResourceResolver;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IUriResolver;
010
011import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
012
013public class AbstractResourceResolver implements IResourceResolver {
014  /**
015   * An {@link IUriResolver} is not provided by default.
016   */
017  private IUriResolver uriResolver;
018
019  @Override
020  public IUriResolver getUriResolver() {
021    return uriResolver;
022  }
023
024  /**
025   * Set the URI resolver for this resource resolver.
026   *
027   * @param uriResolver
028   *          the URI resolver
029   */
030  public void setUriResolver(@NonNull IUriResolver uriResolver) {
031    this.uriResolver = uriResolver;
032  }
033}
